attributes.review:
i was so exited to download this app and support our fine president!! but as soon as i did my phone kept glitching. I WAS TRYING TO MAKE MY GROCERY LIST. my daughter has dance today, it was VERY important to get my list DONE on time!! THANK YOU MR PRESIDENT for ruining my day. i did NOT have time to finish packing MY daughters lunch 😡this app needs to be taken down ASAP.. you should be ashamed of yourself sir

~karen
attributes.title: ANGRY KAREN!!

attributes.review:
When i started the app i couldn't even open all the way because it would kick me out before it finished loading. When i finally got in the app kept crashing when i would click the home button. The absolute worst app i have ever seen.... and the worst president, THANK YOU❤️ 
❤️BERNIE 2020❤️
attributes.title: SO MANY BUGS!!!!

attributes.review: Absolutely horrible I downloaded the app and it stole all my personal information and just days after, my poodle went missing. Coincidence I think not. Overall the app was slow unhelpful and just a waste of storage space. In conclusion, you tried🥳🧚🏾🧚🏿‍♂️now never do it again🤩🥰🧚🏿
attributes.title: No ❤️

attributes.review: Took days to download! It burnt out my phone battery the minute i opened it, it wanted a huge update that drained my phone. This app is terrible and deserves to be taken off the app store. Try something new! I got virus after virus and everything i was logged into on my phone was hacked! terrible app.
attributes.title: Terrible.

attributes.review: This app downloaded fine but then when I open it is hacked my phone and stole all of my information....yikes! As a person I don’t like that and neither should you. Then the app consumed my children so and I don’t know where they are! Did this happen to anyone else...#helpmefindmykids
attributes.title: No thank you do not download 🙏🏼

attributes.review: It was so bad I got the app and it kept saying vote for trump or your going to get sent to the gulag😦🤧like what. I can’t stand with this behavior I’m voting for Biden and I hope you guys do too. And it also said that my kids belong in the garage and it said “trump supports segregation” like omg 😱 how racist.i will not support this I’m not racist I have neg-black friends!!
attributes.title: So bad and terrible 😞

attributes.review: This app was so slow, not to mention it asks you to pay $100 every ten seconds for the campaign. It’s offers are misleading, also not an easy app to use. I suggest it be made more user friendly, just in case the people who use the app need that extra help (i’m sure they would).
attributes.title: Not Good.

attributes.review: Wish I could give it zero stars. App has too long of loading times, terrible graphics, and too many photos of a naked pig man. I thought i was supposed to see trump himself in this app. Must have been another one i guess... Anyway i think this app is the reason im gonna throw away all my electronics

After downloading this app to support my aMAZING president, it asked for my PHONE NUMBER. I’m sorry, sir, but I find this behavior EXTREMELY inappropriate considering you have a WIFE and a CHILD. And, as I’m SURE you know as my Dearly Respected King (i mean president), you MUST know that I HAVE A HUSBAND TOO!!!!!!!!!! And TWELVE UNVACCINATED CHILDREN!!!!! Needless to say, I’m disappointed. I would love to speak to your MANAGER about this, Mr. Trump.
attributes.title: I have a HUSBAND - Karen White

attributes.review: First of all, the app took over a month to download completely. Then, as soon as I open it, the screen is all black. THEN it starts playing these weird cryptic messages and now I’m literally scared for my life. The app gave my phone a virus and I had to get a new one. The app LITERALLY CURSES YOU!!! DO. NOT. GET. IT.
attributes.title: Literally the worst thing to ever happen to me
